Text: I'm feeling that name "Horrorspoke." I guess as a true fan of horror & the macabre, it's no wonder I like the name. If possible, can you upload some werewolf, vampire, satanic, slasher, & gore films from the 70s & early 80s? Thanks for your uploads.
I can indeed - if you have any specific requests then please let me know...... I shall upload one tomorrow for your consideration!
